title: Monster Cars: Ultimate Simulator

controls: • Move: “W,A,S,D”  or ARROW KEYS• NOS: “L-SHIFT”• Brake: “SPACE”• Restart: “R”• Camera: “C”

fullContent: Home› SimulatorMonster Cars: Ultimate SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenMonster Cars: Ultimate Simulator is the driving simulator designed to test your driving skills. The adrenaline is present while you speed up racing against the opponents. Choose a car, customize it and change the tuning.Every car has a specific level of:• Max power• Max torque • Turbo• Shift time• Brake• Wheel grip• Nitro power• Nitro capThere are 4 game modes that can be played single player or multiplayer.• Free Drive • Circuit Race - with 6 levels• Fly race - with 5 levels• Time attack - with 10 levelsMonster Cars: Ultimate Simulator Controls• Move: “W,A,S,D”  or ARROW KEYS• NOS: “L-SHIFT”• Brake: “SPACE”• Restart: “R”• Camera: “C”This article was updated on January 15, 20243DDrivingFreeRacingRallySimulatorTruck
